item.title: Amulet of the Diplomat
item.fluff: This subtle, but pleasing-looking amulet gives the wearer a confident and soothing manner
item.headline: Diplomacy checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to Will defense, and saving throws against Charm effects.

item.title: Amulet of Double Fortune
item.fluff: Good luck begets even better luck when you wear this amulet

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you score a critical hit, after resolving the attack you make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.
You gain an item bonus to this saving throw equal to the amulet's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Amulet of Elegy
item.fluff: This amulet allows you to infuse your voice with sadness that grips the hearts of your foes

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou cause an effect that a save can end
EffectEach target of the triggering effect takes a penalty to its first saving throw equal to the amulet's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Amulet of Health
item.fluff: This golden amulet increases your defenses and resists poison

block.name: Properties
block.line: You gain the following benefits:
You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects with the Poison keyword, including ongoing damage.
You gain resist 5 poison.
Level 13 or 18resist 10
Level 23 or 28resist 15

item.title: Amulet of Life
item.fluff: Crafted in orum, and in the shape of a stylized sun, this amulet flares with amber light whenever it's used

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou spend a healing surge
EffectYou spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

item.title: Amulet of Mental Resolve
item.fluff: Your mind is guarded when wearing this cold iron talisman

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against Charm, Illusion, or Sleep effects.

item.title: Amulet of Physical Resolve
item.fluff: This striking amulet wards you against effects that leave you physically debilitated

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against Poison effects, and effects that render you weakened, slowed, or immobilized.

item.title: Amulet of Protection
item.fluff: This light blue amulet increases your defenses

item.title: Amulet of Resolution
item.fluff: Whether the affliction be of mind or body, this mithral necklace give you a second chance to ward it off

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou fail a saving throw
EffectYou reroll the saving throw, using the second result even if it is lower.

item.title: Amulet of Psychic Interference
item.fluff: A shrunken head carved from bone hangs from a rough twine, and animates and cackles madly when you call upon its power

block.name: Property
block.line: You can choose to make the savings throw against a Charm, Fear, or Psychic effect at the start of your turn instead of at the end of your turn. If you fail the saving throw, you do not get to attempt it again at the end of your turn.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy you can see hits or misses you with an attack that has the Charm, Fear, or Psychic keyword
EffectThe triggering enemy takes 10 psychic damage.
Level 15 or 2015 psychic damage.
Level 25 ot 3020 psychic damage.

item.title: Amulet of Seduction
item.fluff: Supposedly containing the tears of a succubus, this glittering golden amulet can turn a foe's heart toward you and against itself
item.headline: Item BonusBluff checks and Diplomacy checks

block.name: Property
block.line: When you impose a Charm effect that a save can end, the target takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes against that effect.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackClose burst 1 (one creature in the burst); Charisma + this amulet's enhancement bonus vs. Will
HitThe target is under your charm (save ends).
While under your charm, the target cannot attack you, and must take the following action whenever it is able to:

Immediate Interrupt: Requirement: The charmed target is adjacent to you; Trigger: You are the target of a melee attack or ranged attack; The triggering attack targets the charmed target instead of you.
If the charmed target takes damage, this effect immediately ends.

item.title: Amulet of Warding
item.fluff: Polished to a mirror finish, this bronze disk reflects light upon those closest to you, warding them against danger

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn ally adjacent to you is hit by an attack
EffectThe triggering ally gains a power bonus to all defenses until the start of the acting creature's next turn. The power bonus equals this amulet's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Badge of the Berserker
item.fluff: This fearsome badge, crafted from bits of bone and leathery flesh, is favored by those who savor taking the fight to the enemy

block.name: Property
block.line: When you charge, you gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by your movement made as part of the charge.

item.title: Baffling Cape
item.fluff: This rippling cape allows you to slip past an attacking foe

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy adjacent to you misses you with a melee attack
EffectYou and the triggering enemy teleport, swapping positions.
If either has a larger space than the other, you choose where inside the larger space the smaller teleports and which part of the larger space covers the smaller space.

item.title: Brooch of No Regrets
item.fluff: This ornage golden shield pin bolsters your allies even in dire circumstances

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn ally within 10 squares of you fails a saving throw
EffectThe triggering ally rerolls the triggering saving throw, and must use the second result, even if it is lower.
Level 13 or 18The ally has a +2 power bonus to the saving throw.
Level 23 or 28The ally has a +2 bonus to the saving throw.

item.title: Brooch of Shielding
item.fluff: This ornate silver shield pin absorbs force attacks against you

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 force.
Level 13 or 18Resist 10.
Level 23 or 28Resist 15.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are hit by an area, close, or ranged attack
EffectYou gain resist 10 all against the triggering attack.
Level 13 or 18Resist 15 all.
Level 23 or 28Resist 20 all.

item.title: Cape of the Mountebank
item.fluff: With a flourish of this silk-hemmed garment, you transport further away from danger

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits you with an attack
EffectYou teleport up to a number of squares equal to 2 + twice this cape's enhancement bonus, and gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Cloak of Distortion
item.fluff: This cloak roils about you like the rippling air of a scorching desert

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Aöö defenses against ranged attacks from more than 5 squares away

item.title: Cloak of Poison
item.fluff: This heavy cloak feels oily and has a faint chemical smell

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make an attack roll or a saving throw, on a natural roll of 1, you take ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).
Level 15 or 20Ongoing 15 poison damage.
Level 25 or 30Ongoing 20 poison damage.

You can end this ongoing damage as a minor action by taking off this cloak and putting it back on. This disrupts the protection granted by the cloak, giving you a -1 penalty to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will.
Level 20 or 25-2 penalty.
Level 30-3 penalty.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn adjacent enemy hits you with a melee attack
EffectMelee 1 (the triggering enemy); The target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
Level 15 or 20Ongoing 10 poison damage.
Level 25 or 30Ongoing 15 poison damage.

item.title: Cloak of Resistance
item.fluff: This crimson-hemmed cloak can be activated to provide minor resistance to all attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain resist 5 to all damage until the start of your next turn.
Level 12 or 17Resist 10.
Level 22 or 27Resist 15.

item.title: Cloak of the Chirurgeon
item.fluff: This garment gives you the confidence and knowledge to assuage an ally's pain

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one ally); The target regains one healing surge he or she has already spent today.

item.title: Cloak of the Crimson Path
item.fluff: When you're injured, this blood-crusted cloak allows you to take advantage of an enemy's error

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be bloodied.
TriggerAn enemy adjacent to either you or your spirit companion misses with a melee attack
EffectYou and your spirit companion can teleport, swapping positions.
The triggering enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Cloak of the Lion's Mane
item.fluff: This lionskin cloak bestows the majesty of that desert predator upon you to strike fear into the hearts of your foes

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your roar of triumph Barbarian power, you and each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.
Level 24 or 29Shift up to 2 squares.

block.name: Roar of Triumph
block.line: TriggerYour attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points or less
EffectClose burst 5 (each enemy in the burst); Each target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Cloak of the Walking Wounded
item.fluff: Thin red veins form across the fabric of this handsome cloak when its healing properties are evoked

block.name: Property
block.line: If you use your second wind while you are bloodied, you can expend two healing surges instead of one to regain hit points equal to twice your healing surge value instead of your healing surge value.

item.title: Collar of Recovery
item.fluff: Inset with bloodstone, this neckpiece aids healing

block.name: Property
block.line: When you spend a healing surge to regain hit points, you regain additional hit points equal to this collar's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Deep-Pocket Cloak
item.fluff: The hundreds of magically hidden pockets on this cloak allow you to keep a wealth of items close at hand

block.name: Property
block.line: This cloak can hold up to 1,000 pounds in weight or 100 cubic feet in volume, but it always weighs only 1 pound. Each item stored in the cloak's pockets can weigh no more than 10 pounds.
Level 22 or 27The cloak can hold up to 2,000 pounds or 200 cubic feet in volume.
Drawing an item from the cloak or storing one within it is usually a minor action.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou draw an item or store one within it.

item.title: Disk of Energy Resistance
item.fluff: The runes inscribed around the gemstone set in the center of this metal disk are wards to protect from magical attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are hit by a an attack that deals fire, force, lightning, psychic, radiant, or thunder damage
EffectYou gain resist 5 against one of the triggering damage types until the end of the encounter.
Level 14 or 19Resist 10.
Level 24 or 29Resist 15.

item.title: Earthmother Torc
item.fluff: This role-like silver collar is adorned with stylized acorns, oak leaves, holly berries, and ferns, representing the natural world's serenity

block.name: Property
block.line: You are immune to diseases transmitted by shapechanger attacks.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a shapechanger with an attack
EffectThe triggering shapechanger's form is bound (save ends).
While its form is bound, it cannot regain hit points and cannot use Polymorph powers.

item.title: Elven Cloak
item.fluff: This cloack of dull grey, crafted in the elven tradition, helps you blend into your environment

item.title: ESP Medallion
item.fluff: The blue metal medallion hangs from a silver chain, with an eye at its center that moves to look at the creature whose thoughts you wish to know
item.headline: Insight checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou know the exact location of each creature within 10 squares of you. This ignores obstacles and blocking terrain.

item.title: Essence of the Scout
item.fluff: By installing this module, your movements beoome more precise and silent

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +5 power bonus to the first Stealth check you make before the end of your next turn.

item.title: False Blood Amulet
item.fluff: This silver necklace bears a pandant of polished opal, signifying changeability

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectChoose a specific kind of humanoid, such as human, shadar-kai, or a specific type of giant. You gain the following benefits:
You are considered to have the chosen creature's origin and keywords if doing so is beneficial to you.
If the chosen creature speaks a language other than Common, you can speak and read that language, though you gain no other special abilities related to languages.
You gain a +3 item bonus to Bluff checks to disguise and pass yourself off as the type of chosen creature. The bonus is halved if you try to appear as a specific individual.
Level 12 or 17+6 item bonus.
Level 22 or 27+10 item bonus.
These changes last until the end of your next extended rest, or until you use a minor action to end the effect.

item.title: Fireflower Pendant
item.fluff: Formed from a string of fire opals, this ornament unleashes fiery retribution

block.name: Property
block.line: When you take fire damage, the first attack you make before the end of your next turn deals additional fire damage equal to twice this pendant's enhancement bonus, or half that for a multiattack.

item.title: Frostwolf Pelt
item.fluff: The icy white for of this cloak protects you against frost

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 cold.
Level 14 or 19Resist 10.
Level 24 or 29Resist 15.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy adjacent to you hits you with an attack
EffectThe triggering enemy is knocked prone.

item.title: Gloaming Shroud
item.fluff: This billowing cloak drinks in the light around it

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain an item bonus to Stealth checks when you are in dim light or darkness. The bonus equals the shroud's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 10; The burst creates a zone of shifting shadows until the end of the encounter.
Bright light within the zone is reduced to dim light.

item.title: Healer's Brooch
item.fluff: This innocuous adornment boosts your healing powers

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a power that allows either you or an ally to regain hit points, add the brooch's enhancement bonus to the number of hit points regained.

item.title: Lifesaving Brooch
item.fluff: This small white and red pin helps those who seek to aid you

block.name: Property
block.line: Allies gain a +2 bonus to Heal checks made to aid you.
Level 12 or 17+4 bonus.
Level 22 or 27+6 bonus.

item.title: Lucky Charm
item.fluff: Monkey's paw or rabbit's foot, this lucky charm helps you snatch victory from the jaws of defeat

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou miss with an attack roll, or fail a skill check, ability check, or saving throw
EffectRoll a 1d6.
Level 14 or 19Roll a 1d6 twice and choose either result.
Level 24 or 29Roll a 1d8 three times, and choose any of the three results.
Add the result to the triggering roll, check, or saving throw.

item.title: Necklace of Keys
item.fluff: Each key threaded through this leather cord necklace can unlock a portal, even one you haven't detected yet

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou are grabbed or restrained
EffectYou teleport 3 squares and are no longer grabbed or restrained.
Level 13 or 18Teleport 5 squares.
Level 23 or 28Teleport 10 squares.

item.title: Ornament of Alertness
item.fluff: This small amulet or token is etched with an eye, and sharpens your senses

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, enemies do not get to roll twice on their attack rolls when you grant combat advantage to them.
Any other benefits the enemy might gain from combat advantage, such as increased damage, still apply normally.

item.title: Periapt of Health
item.fluff: This charm gives off a sweet scent that only you can detect, masking any odor of noxiousness or corruption

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against disease.

item.title: Periapt of Proof Against Poison
item.fluff: The black gem on this thin silver chain turns white when you're exposed to poison

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 poison.
Level 14 or 19Resist 10 poison.
Level 24 or 29Resist 15 poison.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou take damage from a Poison attack
EffectYour resistance to poison increases by 15 until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Phial of the Empty Vessel
item.fluff: This small hollow crystal bottle dangles from a simple cord, the delicate appearance belieing a strength you can feel coursing through your body

block.name: Properties
block.line: While you have half of your healing surges remaining or less, you gain a +1 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will. This increases to a +2 bonus when you have no healing surges remaining.
You gain a item bonus to Endurance checks equal to twice this item's enhancement bonus or or one-half the number of healing surges you have expended, whichever is lower.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou have no healing surges remaining
TriggerYou roll initiative
EffectYou gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + five times this item's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Psyweave Cloak
item.fluff: This supple cloak feels cool to the touch, and can turn back attacks with the strength of the strongest armor

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain resist 5 all until the start of your next turn.
Level 13 or 18Resist 10 all.
Level 23 or 28Resist 15 all.
1Increase the resist by 5.

item.title: Safewing Amulet
item.fluff: This orange amulet reduces the damage you suffer when falling

block.name: Property
block.line: When falling, for the purposes of calculating falling damage, you reduce the distance fallen by 10 feet.
Level 8By 30 feet.
Level 13By 40 feet.
Level 18 By 60 feet.
Level 23By 70 feet.
Level 28By 100 feet.
You always land on your feet after a fall.

item.title: Scarf of Reconciliation
item.fluff: The shifting colors of this scarf reflect a common legacy, granting you power in the presence of your sibling-race allies

block.name: Property
block.line: RequirementYou must be drow, eladrin, or elf to gain the benefits of this scarf.
This scarf has the following properties:
While you have a drow ally within 10 squares of you, you gain an item bonus to Intimidate checks and Stealth checks.
While you have an eladrin ally within 10 squares of you, you gain an item bonus to Arcana checks and History checks.
While you have an elf ally within 10 squares of you, you gain an item bonus to Nature checks and Perception checks.
The item bonus equals this scrarf's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Spidersilk Mantle
item.fluff: Spun from the silk of a magical spider, this mantle momentarily grants you a spider's effortless ability to climb

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a climb (spider climb) speed equal to your speed until the end of your current turn.

item.title: Sustaining Cloak
item.fluff: The master arcanists of Bael Turath bound supernatural spirits to these cloaks to fuel their power

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerA power or effect you could sustain is ending at the end of your turn
EffectYou sustain the triggering power without using the action normally required.

item.title: Talisman of Terror
item.fluff: This amulet depicts a face with an expression of abject terror
item.headline: Intimidate checks

block.name: Property
block.line: Creatures take a -2 penalty to the first saving throw they make against your Fear powers.

item.title: Vistani Eye Amulet
item.fluff: A large tiger-eye jewel serves as this item's pendant, and sometimes moves like an actual eye

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain an item bonus to saving throws equal to this item's enhancement bonus against effects imposed by attacks with the Gaze keyword.
The bonus also applies to effects that originate in the attacker's eye or eyes, or that affect your eyes or sight (DM's discretion).

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou make a saving throw against one effect that this item grants an item bonus on saves against, even if that effect does not normally end on a save.
